s_title: The Dark Queen of Krynn - A DragonLance Fantasy Role-Playing Epic, Vol.III
s_synopsis: Evil, after failing two times before, finally tries to defeat Good and conquer the world of Krynn. This time, the Dark Queen herself will take command over the forces of Evil. Her aim is to enter Krynn, which would ultimately lead to the defeat of Good. The party's task is to prevent this.
